definitions.definition: To press lightly in a repetitive motion with a soft object without rubbing.
examples: I dabbed my face with a towel.
Dab the tears from your eyes.

definitions.definition: To apply a substance in this way.
examples: The nurse will dab some ointment on that gash.

definitions.definition: To strike by a thrust; to hit with a sudden blow or thrust.
To apply hash oil to a heated surface for the purpose of efficient combustion.
To perform the dab dance move; to move both arms, parallel with one's head, to either side of the body.
Synonym of daub ( to mark a bingo card )

main_definition: ( transitive ) To press lightly in a repetitive motion with a soft object without rubbing.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To apply a substance in this way.
To strike by a thrust; to hit with a sudden blow or thrust.
( slang ) To apply hash oil to a heated surface for the purpose of efficient combustion.
( dance , intransitive ) To perform the dab dance move; to move both arms, parallel with one's head, to either side of the body.
( bingo ) Synonym of daub ( to mark a bingo card )
